short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Blank new tab page. Background is white or dark gray, depending on your system theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
An empty new tab page, with no distractions, tracking, or advertising.

Blank New Tab page does not support custom background colors. The background will either be white or dark gray, depending on your system theme.
